MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Bretton, affecting properties in Broughton Mills Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Our engineers are still working to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.23PM on 21st January 2021.
